statusLine.command: source ~/.dotfiles/git/bin/git-prompt.sh 2>/dev/null; basename=$(basename "$(pwd)"); GIT_OPTIONAL_LOCKS=0; git_info=$(__git_ps1 " (%s)" 2>/dev/null || true); BLUE=$(printf '\033[34m'); YELLOW=$(printf '\033[33m'); RESET=$(printf '\033[0m'); printf "%s%s%s%s%s\n" "$BLUE" "$basename" "$YELLOW" "$git_info" "$RESET"
